verbose_text: Filariae promote the secretion of IL-10 by CD25 hi Foxp3 + T cells [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], which results in a downregulation of the secretory pathway of IL-12p70 / INF-gamma, leading to a decrease in IFN-gamma; TNF-alpha is also lowered [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: promote the secretion of IL-10 by CD25 hi Foxp3
